thread.title: Forced to nominate 2016 candidates a full year before the election, Ark. LP to hold Special Nominating Convention | Opinion - Liberal
thread.title_full: Forced to nominate 2016 candidates a full year before the election, Ark. LP to hold Special Nominating Convention | Opinion - Liberal

author: beforeitsnews.com
title: Forced to nominate 2016 candidates a full year before the election, Ark. LP to hold Special Nominating Convention | Opinion - Liberal
text:
(Before It's News)
via the Libertarian Party of Arkansas:
LPAR 2015 Special Nominating Convention – October 24, 2015
In order to meet the early nomination deadlines that have been imposed by recent legislation, the LPAR must nominate it’s candidates for the 2016 general election by convention before the first week of November 2015. Consequently, we will be holding a SPECIAL NOMINATING CONVENTION on Saturday, October 24, 2015.
… Read more …
